title: Writing:  Write Better Academic Essays (Collins English for Acad
description:
This is the scanned version of this book;


It is scanned by me and it is teacher copy so it also includes answers at the end of the book.

I did not OCR it, i scanned it to OCR but I do not have enough time so it includes only the automatic ocr part (Text Under Image) so you will be able to select/search/highlight text but it can and probably may include some errors.



A step-by-step guide to writing better academic essays

Using this guide will teach students the skills and strategies needed to write well-structured essays, reports, and case studies, and achieve academic success at school. They will learn how to interpret the question; structure their work; paraphrase, quote, and reference sources; avoid plagiarism; and understand their reader. This guide includes a complete 2500-word model essay
